channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Apprenda Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Apprenda Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41251|2024-08-03T12:35:49.650Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20apprenda%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Apprenda Plugin 2.2.0 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.
